tool_description:
Easily get any data related to YouTube short form content, this includes: shorts, sounds, songs, artist, music album and channels.

✅ Easy to use API
✅ High uptime
✅ Fast response times
✅ High data reliability


If you need support, want to request extra features or need a custom plan, contact us at: https://t.me/dashydata
name: YouTube Shorts, Sounds & Songs API
title: YouTube Shorts, Sounds & Songs API

api_list.name: /album/playlistId/{playlistId}
api_list.description: Gets the album information given its playlistId (can get it through the YouTube UI)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com/album/playlistId/OLAK5uy_lRly1oG8OVTI3C2gZv0pPjYxH-Q3U6GrM"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com/album/playlistId/{playlistid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /album/browseId/{browseId}
api_list.description: Gets the album information given its browseId (you can get it from song/{videoId} or the channel songs endpoints)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com/album/browseId/MPREb_Wz5C5MGVpsz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /song/{videoId}
api_list.description: Gets the song attributed to a short or video (if it has one)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com/song/FrsOnNxIrg8"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /short/{videoId}
api_list.description: Gets the information for a short given its id

api_list.name: /channel/id/{channelId}/shorts
api_list.description: Get the shorts of a channel given its channel id

api_list.name: /channel/handle/{handle}/songs
api_list.description: Gets the songs that belong to a channel (if it's an artist channel) given its handle

api_list.name: /channel/handle/{handle}
api_list.description: Gets the channel information given its handle
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com/channel/handle/@DrakeOfficial"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /channel/handle/{handle}/shorts
api_list.description: Gets the shorts of a channel given its handle

api_list.name: /channel/id/{channelId}/songs
api_list.description: Gets the songs that belong to a channel (if it's an artist channel) given its channel id

api_list.name: /sound/{soundId}/shorts
api_list.description: Returns the shorts created using a given sound

api_list.name: /sound/{soundId}
api_list.description: Gets information for a sound given its id (it's the same as the original video id)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com/sound/FrsOnNxIrg8"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-shorts-sounds-songs-api.p.rapidapi.com/sound/{soundid}"

headers = {

        }

print(response.json())
